text: [Music]
[Music]
hello I'm creating a cloud support
engineer here at the AWS headquarters in
Seattle today I'm going to show you how
to enable quick connects on Amazon
cunning so let's get started
you can enable quick connects and use
them on your soft phone also call the
contact control panel or CCP before
getting into the demo let me quickly go
over three types of quick connects and
the use cases for each one you can
configure quick connects of these types
agent queue or external depending upon
your use case you can use agent quick
connect if a customer makes a call to
your contact center and you want to
reconnect them to the agent they spoke
to previously a Q Quick Connect is
useful when you want to transfer a
customer to another queue to answer
their queries which are outside the
scope of the initial Q the Q Quick
Connect eliminates the need for the
customer to reinitiate the call because
the customer is directly transferred to
that specific queue which provides a
better customer experience external
quick connects are helpful if you want
to transfer customers to a third party
who is not a part of Amazon Connect for
example if you are an insurance company
and your customer wants to tow their car
you might want to just transfer their
call to the third party towing company
you can also use quick connects when you
want to have a conference call where two
agents need to be in the same call with
your customer after logging into the AWS
management console navigate to the
Amazon connect console and then log in
to your connect instance and I'm logging
in as the administrator hover over the
routing icon on the Left tab and then
choose quick connects choose add new and
then enter the details based on the type
of the quick connect you want to
configure so go ahead and type in your
Quick Connect name and then choose the
type of quaint current you would like to
configure and please choose the agent
that you would like to be the
destination and then choose your contact
flow and please feel free to give a
description to your Quick Connect and
save the configuration finally add the
quick connects to the queue configure to
the agent you can verify the queues
assigned to an agent
their outing for file page if quick
connects Arden added to the queue they
won't be visible in the agency CP now
let's get into the queue section and
then choose your queue that you would
like to configure the quick connects for
scroll down to the quick connect section
and add in the quick connect that you
just created save the queue
configuration and now when you click on
the contact control panel you should be
able to see the external quick connects
that you just created now here are some
points to remember quick connects of
type agent or queue are visible on the
CCP only when the agent is on call
however quick connects of type external
are available in the CCP
whether an agent is on call or not
transfers to quick connect of type agent
are successful only if the end agent
status is available if this status is
not available then the transfer fails
when the call is transferred directly to
an agent or external number the agent
must make sure that they join both the
customer and the transfer destination
then the original agent can decide to
leave or continue on the conference call
as of now you can delete quick connects
if you don't want to use a quick connect
you can either edit the existing quick
connect or remove it from queue
configuration to hide it in CCP thanks
for watching and happy cloud computing
from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
you
